properties.address: Aberbeeg Community Centre, Pant Ddu Road,, Aberbeeg, Blaenau Gwent np13 2bp
properties.description: It's a friendly, welcoming, warm, well lit space. If anyone enjoys the outdoors we also have a community garden and allotment program. There is also a park near our centre as well as a woodland well-being area We also have a beautiful garden area, where some members like to go out and enjoy with a hot drink
properties.title: Aberbeeg Community Centre

properties.description: We are a friendly space where everyone is welcome. We have lots of resources from books, free computers, free WIFI, printing and photocopying, free refreshments and both areas for quiet reflection or areas where you can have a chat. Closed 1 - 2pm for lunch.
properties.title: Blaenau Gwent Libraries - Abertillery Library

properties.description: We cater mainly for older people but all are welcome. We have board games and jigsaws or just enjoy a chat. Tea, coffee and biscuits/cakes and a light lunch available

properties.description: We offer a warm safe place for people to come and meet new friends

properties.title: Ebenezer Centre

properties.address: Fairhill Methodist Church, Cwmbran, Gwent NP44 4QS
properties.description: Our coffee morning (hot drinks and biscuits) runs throughout the year every Tuesday between 10-11.30am offering a chance to chat. This becomes a winter Warm Welcome Space on 28th October 2025 with extended opening -10am -1.30pm. We offer hot drinks and squash and biscuits and a lunch of baked potato (choice of toppings) or soup. These are all free but donations are welcome. We also provide board games, cards, dominoes/chess and jigsaws and toys for pre-school children and can also offer craft activities. We are disabled friendly, have a car park, the no 5a bus stops just outside and there's free WiFi too. We also run a Games Cafe on the 2nd Saturday of the month with board games and free refreshments between 3 and 5pm.
properties.title: Fairhill Methodist Church, Cwmbran

properties.description: Church Vestry warm drinks and food available. Please follow signs and use side entrance.
properties.title: Hope Baptist Church
